heading: Today
text: Early showers ending.  Increasing sun west to east. Breezy and warm.

heading: Friday Night
text: Partly cloudy, then more clouds with a few localized showers.

heading: Saturday
text: Showers becoming likely late morning and afternoon. Strong afternoon thunderstorms possible south.
temperature: Mid 60s to lower 80s, northwest to southeast

heading: Sunday
text: Partly sunny in NY, northern VT, and Quebec. A chance of showers east and south.
temperature: Lower 60s to lower 70s, north to south
